about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the epic world of "Shattered Kingdoms," an MMORPG that harks back to the golden age of classic games like Runescape and Tibia. Crafted with passion for fans of the genre, this game invites you into a realm where every choice and every adventure writes the saga of your journey.

Navigate through a grid-based environment, which breathes the charm of old-school MMOs.



Unleash your creativity in a world where crafting and building are cornerstones of civilization. From forging legendary weapons to constructing monumental structures, your hands hold the power to shape the world.

Embark on quests that take you across diverse landscapes, from mystic forests to treacherous mountains. Encounter a variety of NPCs, each with their own story, and become a part of the living, breathing world of Shattered Kingdoms.



Brace yourself for encounters with a plethora of creatures. Battle ferocious beasts and fantasy entities like cunning goblins and fearsome dragons. Each encounter is a test of skill and strategy.

Join a community where collaboration and competition thrive. Forge alliances, engage in trade, or face off in battles. Your actions influence the world, adding a unique layer to your gaming experience.



Whether you're a veteran of MMORPGs or new to the genre, "Shattered Kingdoms" offers an experience where legends are born, and stories are forged. Your kingdom awaits - are you ready to leave your mark in the annals of this shattered world?

content_descriptors.notes: Depiction of alcohol, black magic and dark spells such as necromancy, production of fantasy potions (may depict drugs or alcohol)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 710M or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Could probably benefit from one
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one
